heroSection.description: This image showcases a cozy and inviting living area with rustic decor elements, including a wood-paneled accent wall, a ceiling fan, and a framed poster. The space exudes warmth and character.

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Robert Pat Johnston
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text:
I have tell you  they did an incredible job painting our whole house, people who see it comment on the excellent work they did, they go over and  beyond.

They also refaced all the kitchen cabinets in which they did an incredible job. Many did not think could be  restored but they did it.

They installed all the new flooring in which they also did an amazingly job.

They were helpful in many ways in this project and would recommend James and his wife for work you need done. You will not be disappointed.

Pat and Mary Kay
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: A Revolution LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Susan Echols
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: These guys do wonderful work. They basically gave me a new kitchen and dining area! They put up fresh paint on the walls, crown molding, chair rail molding, and they regrouted the floor. They also put up a new light over the dining table and a new sink for the kitchen. They also sanded all of the cabinets and gave them some new paint and new fixtures, not to mention the curtain rods and curtains that they put up in the dining area. I could not be more happy! They use such care! My kitchen and dining area are now so beautiful that I want to show it off all the time! You would definitely never be unpleased with the work from James and Kaleigh!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: A Revolution LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jessica Turley
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: We were very pleased with the results of our home repairs. They were professional and courteous. We will definitely use them again.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: A Revolution LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Charlotte Ford
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: This company has done so many different jobs for me.  They have redone my whole kitchen, electrical, flooring,and plumbing throughout my entire house. They have also built steps for me.  Anything I have needed doing, they have completed it successfully and beautifully.  I would highly recommend them to anyone.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: A Revolution LLC

### Business Information:

- **Alabama Business Registration/License Details**: There is no specific information provided in the sources about the business registration or license details of A Revolution LLC. However, it is listed as a legitimate business operating in Dothan, AL.
- **Physical Location and Service Areas**: A Revolution LLC is located at 3004 Hillary Hill Rd, Dothan, AL 36303. They provide services in the greater Dothan, AL area[1][4].
- **Hours and Payment Methods**: The sources do not specify the business hours of A Revolution LLC. However, they accept all major credit cards, cash, and checks as payment methods[4].
- **Years in Operation**: There is no information provided about the exact number of years A Revolution LLC has been in operation.

### Services & Specialties:

- **Types of Services Offered**: A Revolution LLC specializes in various home renovations and repairs, including painting, flooring, bathroom and kitchen remodels, lighting, and ceiling fans. They also handle plumbing services, as indicated by their listing as a plumber[1][4].
- **Service Areas Covered**: They serve the greater Dothan, AL area[1][4].
- **Emergency Service Availability**: There is no specific information provided about the availability of emergency services.

### Customer Reviews & Reputation:

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples**: A Revolution LLC has a 5-star rating based on 8 reviews. Customers praise the company for their excellent work in various areas such as painting the entire house, remodeling kitchens and dining areas, and handling electrical, flooring, and plumbing jobs. For example, Charlotte F. mentioned that the company has done multiple jobs for her, including redoing her entire kitchen, electrical work, flooring, and plumbing throughout her home[1].
- **BBB Rating and Status**: There is no information provided in the sources about the BBB rating or status of A Revolution LLC.
- **Common Customer Feedback Themes**: Customers consistently praise the professionalism, courtesy, and quality of work provided by A Revolution LLC. They appreciate the comprehensive services and the positive outcomes of their projects[1].
- **Response to Reviews**: There is no information available on how the business responds to customer reviews.

### Owner & Staff:

- **Staff Qualifications**: There is no information available about the qualifications or professional certifications of the staff at A Revolution LLC.
- **Professional Certifications**: No specific professional certifications are mentioned in the sources provided[1][4].
aboutUs: At A Revolution LLC, we are a team of highly skilled professionals dedicated to providing top-notch home renovation and repair services to the greater Dothan, AL area. Our expertise spans a wide range of specialties, including painting, flooring, bathroom and kitchen remodels, lighting installations, and comprehensive plumbing solutions. With a strong local presence and a commitment to excellence, we strive to deliver exceptional results that exceed your expectations.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the revolution in home improvement with A Revolution LLC, where quality craftsmanship and customer satisfaction are our top priorities.
sellingPoints: Comprehensive services under one roof, from painting and flooring to plumbing and remodeling, ensuring a seamless and hassle-free experience.
Meticulous attention to detail and a commitment to using only the highest-quality materials, ensuring long-lasting and visually stunning results.
A team of skilled professionals who prioritize open communication, respect for your property, and a commitment to meeting your unique needs and preferences.
